Description: Company that operates the well
Date in which the well was completed
Geologic formation that the well is targeting
Completed length of the horizontal well
Amount of proppant (frac sand) per lateral foot used to complete the well
Amount of fluid per lateral foot used to complete the well
Horizontal distance to the nearest offset well - measured at the time the well was completed
Horizontal distance to the nearest offset well - measured at current time
Vertical distance to the nearest offset well - measured at the time the well was completed
Vertical distance to the nearest offset well - measured at current time
Depth of the horizontal well
Thickness of the targeted reservoir

Column Units: Million barrels of oil / square mile
Description: Amount of oil in place for the target reservoir
Porosity of the target reservoir
Pressure of the target reservoir
% saturation of water in the target reservoir fluid
% change in depth of the target formation - proxy for geologic faults
% of total organic carbon of the target formation
% clay of the target reservoir
% carbonate of the target reservoir
Maturity of the target reservoir
Total cost of the horizontal well
Amount of oil produced in the first 12 months of production
